### Kristina15 Dataset
The following are preliminary runs of the R package 
[`meda`](https://github.com/neurodata/meda) on the 
synaptome data with different transformations applied to 
the data prior to analysis.

#### Run on 1000 sample points with seed 1234 from the total ~1.1e6 points
- [Raw](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/Kristina15/Raw/SynDataRaw.html)
- [Log_10](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/Kristina15/Log10/SynDataLog10.html)
- [Scaled 0-1000](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/Kristina15/01e3/SynData01e3.html)  
- [HeatMaps](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/HeatMaps.html)  
- [Shapes](http://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/neurodata/non-parametric-clustering/blob/master/procrustes_clustering/notebooks/procrustes_clustering.ipynb)

#### Run on 10000 sample points with seed 317 from the total ~1.1e6 points
- [Raw](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/K15_1e4/Raw/SynDataRaw.html)
- [Log_10](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/K15_1e4/Log10/SynDataLog10.html)
- [Scaled 0-1000](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/K15_1e4/01e3/SynData01e3.html)  

### Weiler Dataset (Ex10R55 -- Chessboard)
The following are preliminary runs of the R package 
[`meda`](https://github.com/neurodata/meda) on the 
synaptome data with different transformations applied to 
the data prior to analysis.

#### Run on 1000 sample points with seed 317 from the total ~190,000 points
- [Raw](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/Weiler/Raw/Ex10R55_Raw.html)
- [Log_10](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/Weiler/Log10/Ex10R55_Log10.html)
- [Scaled 0-1000](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/Weiler/01e3/Ex10R55_01e3.html)  

#### Run on 10000 sample points with seed 1234 from the total ~190,000 points
- [Raw](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/W_1e4/Raw/Ex10R55_Raw.html)
- [Log_10](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/W_1e4/Log10/Ex10R55_Log10.html)
- [Scaled 0-1000](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/W_1e4/01e3/Ex10R55_01e3.html)
